entry.tran: 修饰语;(某些语法中仅指置于名词前的)修饰词
entry.def: A modifier is a word or group of words that modifies another word or group. In some descriptions of grammar, only words that are used before a noun are called modifiers .

means.word_mean: 1. a content word that qualifies the meaning of a noun or verb
2. a moderator who makes less extreme or uncompromising
4. a gene that modifies the effect produced by another gene
